item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, January 22, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:

3. 0-click deanonymization attack targeting Signal, Discord, other platforms (1266 points | 395 comments)

26. Prime numbers so memorable that people hunt for them (146 points | 79 comments)

29. Sigstore: Making sure your software is what it claims to be (89 points | 32 comments)
